refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o atonex.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; unfiltered noise
asig rand 0.7 ; white noise outs asig, asig
endin
instr 2 ; filtered noise
asig rand 0.7 khp line 100, p3, 3000 afilt atonex asig, khp, 32
; Clip the filtered signal's amplitude to 85 dB. a1 clip afilt, 2, ampdb(85) outs a1, a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 i 2 2 2
e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
